title: Rosie
text: She's a doggie who likes sausages.

title: Quentin
text: Is in charge of the sausage cooking.  He is banned from making them.

title: People
text: Some people don't even eat sausages.

title: Daddy
text: He likes both bacon and sausages.

title: Pan
text: Greek god pan, one half goat and the other half man.

title: Jimmy Dean
text: Was a man who loved sausages.
